column4: hello.. question: is it possible to copy a a file which is currently being downloaded? say downloading an iso to my ubuntu box and then relay the file as it comes in over my lan/ftp to another box?

i played around with that a long time ago.. i found that the only effective way is too rate-filter the server so that the download too the final target is slower than the download coming off the source
ok so as long as my local ftp dosen't get to the end of the file I am good? or did I misunderstand
